entry.title: openstreetmap-neo4j

this project was developed for an university exam.
App that implement different graph operation on Neo4j database that contain Open Street Map nodes.
Installation
Neo4j Desktop Python Py2neo: pip install py2neo Neo4j APOC library (install from Neo4j Desktop) OpenStreetMap dataset available as sample project in Neo4j Desktop

entry.title: lu-solver
entry.summary:
this project was developed for an university exam.
The LU decomposition factors a square matrix A into the product of two matrices:
A = LU
where:
L is a lower triangular matrix (all elements above the diagonal are zero); U is an upper triangular matrix (all the elements below the diagonal are zero).
Parallelization made using:
OpenMP CUDA
Device used: Jetson Nano
